Uses of Package
modules

  • Packages that use modules 
    Package Description
    clientIO
    this package contains all the input/output files on the client side.
    modules
    this package contains the common modules.
    serverLogic
    this package contains all the logic files on the server side.
  • Classes in modules used by clientIO 
    Class and Description
    Property
    a class for properties, when value changed all Listeners
    ServerRequest
    class for communication between client and server
  • Classes in modules used by modules 
    Class and Description
    PeriodicallyRunner
    Class that execute specific "job" at specific time
    runs it every "delta" time
    Property
    a class for properties, when value changed all Listeners
    PropertyListener
    class for functional programming for value change action
    ServerRequest
    class for communication between client and server
    ServerRequest.Manager 
    SystemConfig
    Class for configuration only for the presentation
    if the configuration file not exist use defaults
  • Classes in modules used by serverLogic 
    Class and Description
    IController 
    ObservableList
    base implementation of ObservableList, support add and remover Properties
    ServerRequest
    class for communication between client and server
    WakeableThread
    extends the Thread class to create Thread that you can wake.
    while asleep(WakeableThread.sleepUntillWoken()) can be woken by
    WakeableThread.wake().
